items.title: Money Matters| How to save Rs 1 cr in 10 years,: Check how much you need to invest every month
items.description:
Path to becoming a crorepati? Owning Rs 1 crore is an investor's dream. Strategic investments, like SIPs in equity funds, can help reach that goal. Regular investing and a long-term view are crucial. Even a Rs 1,000 SIP can grow substantially over time, thanks to compounding. Disciplined investing is key to turning your crorepati dream into reality. Here is how to accumulate Rs 1 crore from mutual fund SIPs in 10 years, 15 years, 20 years and 25 years.
#sip #personalfinance #equityfunds #compounding #investment

items.title: IndiGo announces Black Friday sale, fares to start from Rs 1,199 for domestic flights
items.description: The sale will go live for booking from November 29 to December 2 and the travel dates available are between January 1 to March 31, the airline said.

items.title: Business in the Week Ahead (December 2- 6, 2024)
items.description: From the Indian central bank's policy meet to the release of PMI Services data for US, UK, and Euro area - a slew of macro data is scheduled for next week. Here are some important macroeconomic indicators that market participants should watch closely

items.title: Explained: Why India needs nuclear power and what is it doing about it
Green Finance: Addressing misconceptions and urging immediate action
items.description: Green finance is an urgent necessity, not a distant goal. Despite misconceptions, it offers substantial economic and environmental benefits. Financial institutions must embrace comprehensive ESG strategies, assess green opportunities, and collaborate to drive sustainability, ensuring long-term growth and impact

items.title: BCAS fines IndiGo Rs 5 lakh for aviation security violations
items.description: The airline is reviewing the BCAS order, issued on November 27, and plans to appeal it to the relevant authority, according to a regulatory filing
